top_problem_solved: “While planning a large-scale protocol event in Lakshadweep, our logistics relied on shipping materials from Cochin. At the last minute, the scheduled ship was canceled due to mechanical issues. With no time to lose, we quickly rerouted the materials via truck to the nearest port in Calicut, ensuring seamless transport. Despite the setback, we executed the setup on schedule, delivering a flawless event. Our ability to adapt under pressure ensured the client’s trust and a successful event.”
my_favourite_bni_story: n the world of business networking, every handshake, every introduction, and every small act of service has the potential to open doors we never anticipated. This story is a testament to the power of relationships built through BNI and how a simple opportunity turned into a prestigious event collaboration. On December 11, 2022, I was given the responsibility to pick up and escort the Chief Guest for the BNI GIVERS RUN event—Mr. Rajnish Henry, the esteemed Chief of the Indian Blind Cricket Team. Though my role was not to manage the event, I took the opportunity to engage, connect, and build rapport with him during our time together. Rather than treating it as just another task, I saw it as a moment to create a lasting impression—to listen, share insights, and nurture a professional relationship. That simple interaction, a conversation during the ride, and a genuine connection planted the seed for something much bigger. Fast forward to 2025, my phone rang, and on the other end was none other than Mr. Rajnish Henry. He remembered the trust and professionalism I had shown during that brief encounter in 2022. This time, he wasn’t just calling for a pickup—he was calling me to organize the grand inauguration of the IndusInd Bank Women’s National T20 Cricket Tournament for the Blind – 5th Edition at Durbar Hall Ground, Kochi. The opportunity to be part of such a national-level sporting event was an honor. What started as a small connection through the BNI platform had now transformed into a high-profile event collaboration—one that wouldn’t have happened without BNI’s emphasis on building meaningful relationships and trust over time. The Lesson? BNI is not just about business referrals—it’s about being present, making an impact, and cultivating long-term relationships. You never know when a simple meeting can turn into a career-defining opportunity. BNI doesn’t just create connections; it creates success stories!

my_business: I am an internationally certified Level 4 Personal Fitness Trainer specializing in online training with a focus on weight loss, weight gain, medical conditions, and rehabilitation. My programs are tailored to individual needs, combining science-backed techniques with a personalized approach to achieve sustainable results. While my primary focus is on online training, I also offer limited offline sessions for hands-on guidance. Let’s connect to transform your fitness journey with expert support!
top_product: My top product is my personalized online training programs, which are tailored to meet individual goals such as weight loss, weight gain, or managing medical conditions and rehabilitation. These programs combine science-backed fitness techniques with a personalized approach, ensuring sustainable results for clients at their convenience. Additionally, I offer virtual group training sessions and limited offline sessions for those seeking hands-on guidance.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is individuals looking for personalized fitness solutions, including those aiming for weight loss, weight gain, rehabilitation, or managing medical conditions through structured exercise. I also seek referrals to busy professionals, post-injury clients, and seniors who prefer convenient online training but need expert guidance. Additionally, I welcome referrals from corporate wellness programs, physiotherapists, and healthcare professionals who want to collaborate on holistic fitness solutions for their clients.
top_problem_solved: The top problem I solve is helping clients overcome fitness barriers related to weight loss, weight gain, and rehabilitation from medical conditions or injuries. Many individuals struggle with lack of motivation, injury recovery, and the challenges of finding a convenient fitness solution. I provide personalized online training programs that are scientifically backed, offering clients a flexible, effective, and safe approach to achieve their fitness goals while accommodating their unique health needs.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite BNI stories is when a fellow member referred a client who was recovering from a serious knee injury and struggling to regain strength. Through a personalized online training program, I was able to help them rehabilitate safely and regain mobility at their own pace, without the stress of attending in-person sessions. The client was so pleased with the progress that they not only continued the training but also referred their friends who had similar fitness challenges. This story is a reminder of how BNI connections can lead to transformative results for clients, both in their fitness journey and in business growth.

ideal_referral: Health-conscious individuals: People who want to understand their genetic predispositions to optimize their health, fitness, and lifestyle choices. Individuals with family history of genetic conditions: Those looking to assess potential risks for conditions like diabetes, heart disease, or cancer. Couples planning for pregnancy: Individuals interested in carrier screening to assess inherited genetic conditions. Healthcare professionals: Doctors, nutritionists, and fitness coaches who want to offer personalized health and wellness recommendations based on their patients' genetic data. Corporate wellness programs: Companies seeking to offer employees a proactive approach to health management.
top_problem_solved: Uncertainty about genetic health risks: DcodmyDNA helps individuals identify genetic predispositions to various health conditions, such as heart disease, diabetes, and certain cancers, allowing them to take preventive actions early. Challenges in optimizing fitness and performance: DcodmyDNA helps fitness enthusiasts and athletes understand how their genes influence their physical capabilities and recovery, enabling them to optimize training and performance. Family planning and genetic risks: For couples planning a family, DcodmyDNA offers genetic screening to identify potential inherited conditions, providing peace of mind and informed decision-making. Complexity in understanding genetic data: With professional genetic counseling, DcodmyDNA ensures that users receive clear, actionable insights from their genetic reports, overcoming the challenge of interpreting complex genetic information.
